Schedule of activities Arrivals and departures Cars Cost Guialmons to SCQ Lodging People Preparation Survival Guide

PML 2016

Schedule of activities

Saturday July 23

  • Afternoon: pool, hang out, arrivals
  • Evening: town party at Santa Coloma's main plaza

Sunday July 24

  • 15:00: Ultimate frisbee game in Guialmons
  • 19:00: Tapas meet-up in Barcelona (for those that are there) at Cafeteria Rovica
  • 19:00: Tapas meet-up in Santa Coloma at Snack Bar Rosa

Monday July 25

  • 10:30 - 11:30: at la Estrella bar for breakfast
  • 11:30 - 12:30: Walking tour of SCQ with Jaume
  • 12:30 - 13:30: Market in town square and groceries
  • 13:30 - 15:30: "Vermut" and sandwiches in town square
  • 15:30 - 16:30: Walk/drive back to Guialmons
  • 19:00 - Horseback riding and dinner at Can Casellas

Tuesday July 26

  • 08:00 - 11:00: Hike Sant Miquel mountain
  • 13:00 - 15:00: Lunch at Colomi restaurant
  • 15:00 - 17:00: SCQ pool
  • 20:00: Gainesville Brews make BBQ dinner
  • 21:00: Poker tournament!

Wednesday July 27

  • 10:00 - 13:00: Paintball here
  • 10:00 - 13:00; Go-karting here
  • 14:00 - 16:00: Lunch at platja llarga beach (restaurant)
  • 16:00 - 20:00: Beach time at platja llarga (restaurant not yet confirmed)
  • 20:00: Traditional Catalan light dinner at home (catered)

Thusday July 28

  • 08:00 - 12:00: Montserrat monastery hike
  • 13:00 - 15:00: Lunch at http://www.calnoio.com/ (reserve)
  • 16:00 - 18:00: Cava tour (location not yet confirmed)
  • 20:00: Potluck dinner (everyone cooks)
  • 21:00: Ping-pong tournament finals!

Friday July 29

  • 12:00 - 13:00: Short hike to Figuerola
  • 13:00 - 15:00: Picnic at the hermitage of Figuerola
  • 16:00 - 17:00: Soccer game at the SCQ field
  • 17:00 - 19:00: SCQ pool
  • 20:00 - 23:00: Tapas in town square
  • 23:00 - 00:00: Concert at SCQ castle (Coloma singing in it)

Saturday July 30

  • Day trip to Girona

Sunday July 31 (and beyond)

  • To be determined
